overview: HUNTING HITLER tells the true story of a group of Nazi party leaders who sought to murder Adolf Hitler in 1944. Though their plot did not succeed, these conspirators came closer than any others to taking out Hitler. This in-depth documentary looks back at their detailed plan and includes remarkable testimony from a handful of the surviving participants
tagline: Through luck, planning and paranoia, the most hated man on earth defied those who tried to take his life
title: Hunting Hitler
